title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Tweek's house, night. He's on the sofa looking at news.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: And in other news, another school shooting has taken place, this time in Idaho. As these kinds of shooting increase, one thing becomes clear: Your children are not safe at school.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh God!  Change it! Change it!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: This was the second time a terrorist threat has been made on a theme park, leaving everyone to realize that children are not safe outside.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Agh! God, change it!!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: And it seems there's a new danger to look out for: children who are taken by strangers. The bottom line: children are not safe... in their own homes!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Aaaah!!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Tweek.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Gahahghah

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Come to the kitchen, sweetie. We need to see you real quick.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Kitchen. Richard is at table as Tweek arrives. Tweek's mom is serving coffee. There are two coffee makers in the background

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh God. They're gonna get me.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Sit down and have some coffee, son. Tweek, there's starting to be a lot of reports in the news about kids being abducted, and we thought we should talk.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I s-I saw! Uuuh!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: You know never to talk to strangers, right Tweek? You can't trust anybody.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh God! Huh!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Now, we don't want to alarm you, son, but we've isntalled new locks on your bedroom windows and door. Important for you to know never to unlock them at night for anyone except your mother and I.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh Jesus! Huh!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: It's just a precaution, sweetie. Probably nothing will ever happen.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Tweek house, after bedtime. Tweek is in his bed having a nightmare.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: No, ...NO! They're gonna get me!  GAAAH! Huh, huh, huh-oh, oh God.  Uh, just a dream.  OH MY GOD!!  GAAAH!!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Tweek! This is Officer Daniels! Now, try and stay calm, but we believe an abductor is in your room!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: ...Inside my room? Oh God!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Give it up, buddy! We've got ya surrounded! Okay, Tweek, I want you to very calmly but quickly walk to the door and come out to us!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh my God!  Oh! Oh! Jesus, see me through this.  AAAHH!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Bang!  You're dead, Tweek.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: What??

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: You failed the test, son. Didn't I tell you not to open the door for anybody except your mother and I?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh God! Oh Jesus!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: What if that had been a child abductor pretending to be a police officer, Tweek?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: He would have sprayed your brains all over the floor and then taken your body off to the woods.  You've got to be on your toes, Tweek. Alright, now go to bed and get some rest.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: 'Night, pumpkin.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Bijou, next day. "Men In Black II" is showing. Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Tweek walk up to the ticket booth

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I hope this movie doesn't suck ass.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: It will.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: One please.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Wait, that's not the usual ticket-taker guy!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: So?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: So? I don't know him!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Dude, relax.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: You relax! What if he wants to kill me?! AAAAAAAA!!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Gah, what the hell do his parents do to him?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Down the road. Tweek is running, but soon tires out. A car pulls up and the driver looks out the passenger window

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: 'Scuse me, is this the right road to Breckenridge.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: AAH! Uh...

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Please, I just need to know if this is "South Park"?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Get away from meee!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: A street corner. Tweek arrives there and stops to catch his breath. An elderly lady walks up and taps his hair. Tweek screams and jumps back. The crossing signal says "WALK," so it's alright for both to cross the street

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Could you help me across the street?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I don't know you!  Ah, AAAH!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The outskirts of town. Tweek is running and arrives at some train tracks. A man in a wheelchair sits between the tracks. He looks behind to see that no one has followed him

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, hey, kid!  Oh, thank God you happened by. My- my chair ran out of juice right on these train tracks. If you hadn't had shown up, well... Well, anyway, could you give me a push?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Huh uh!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: No, no, you don't understand. I'm, I'm paralyzed from the neck down. I push the chair with this device in front of my mouth, but it's it's not working, so you see-

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I'm not supposed to talk to you!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Please, this, this isn't funny, kid. You have to help me.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: But it could be a trick!  Ugh. That's a pretty good trick.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Tweek house, night. Tweek is again asleep, peacefully. A light fills the room and rouses him from his sleep. At the foot of the bed is a man dressed in a robe. He holds a scepter in his right hand and wears laurel branches on his head. He is glowing, as is the bauble atop the scepter

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: AaaaAAAHH!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Relax, Tweek. I am not here to hurt you. I am the Ghost of Human Kindness.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Ghost of Human Kindness?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: What do you want?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Huh-uh, how can I help it? It seems that everywhere I turn, someone is out to get me.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: It isn't?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: A woman enters the Shady Acres Retirement Community and heads for the front door. Tweek and the ghost arrive and follow her in

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: A one-story house, later. Tweek and the ghost reach the front window

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The camera looks at a snowy sky with a full moon and pans down. Tweek and the ghost are walking down the highway

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: South Park. Tweek and the ghost are back in town

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I think so. You mean that, even though all the news is about murderers and abductors, those kind of people... only make up a very small part of the world.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I'll... try.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Your van?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Alright Johnson, give it up!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: What the hell is going on??

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Tweek, Tweek, are you okay?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Did he hurt you, son?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: No

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Then we aren't too late. His name is Frederick Johnson. He's been abducting children by dressing up like the Ghost of Human Kindness for over a year now.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: What's going on?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: A stranger was caught trying to abduct the Tweek boy.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: An abductor in our town?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh my God, what are we gonna do?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: South Park City Hall, next day. The townsfolk are clamoring outside the front door

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble...

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: People, people, calm down.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Well what are we gonna do, Mayor?! We have to stop these abductors from being able to get into our town!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble...

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yes, but standing out here yelling "Rabble rabble rabble" isn't going to help anything.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Well we don't know what else to do, Mayor!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: People, what do you think we need to do?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Uh, well, we need to find a way to close our town off from unwanted strangers!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yes, we need a barrier to protect our kids.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble rabble...

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Wait, that's it. A wall. We could build a huge city wall all around South Park so that we have complete control over who comes in.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: That's... not a bad idea, a city wall.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: But who can we get to build it?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: City Wok, later. Several adults are in the restaurant

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: ...And so, we want you to design and build a great wall, all around the city.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I don' build wall. I just own un' operate City Wok.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: We just think that you're the best person to put up a wall. We're sure you've got it in your blood.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, I get it. Just because I Chinese, you think I build wall. That i' bullshit! I'm not stereotype, okay?! Just because I'm Chinese doesn't mean I go around building wall! I'm just a normal person like all o'you! I eat ahrice and drive ahreally slow, just like the rest o'you! I'm not stereotype!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Please, Mr. Tuong Lu Kim.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Your ancestors put up a great wall that kept Mongolians out for thousands of years. We know you can do it for us.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Outside South Park, some weeks later. A great wall has gone up around South Park, enclosing it like a medieval wall. This is the Great Wall of South Park. Tuong, dressed in his restaurant's uniform, is laying down some bricks. He hears some horses and look up. Some Mongolians have arrived and drawn their swords. They chip away at the wall.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Hey. Hey hey!  Hey, what the hell you doing?!  Mongorians? What the hell Mongorians doing here?  Ey, fuck you, Mongorians! Tryin' break down my wall!  Get out of here, fuckin' Mongorians!  God-damnit, how come every time us Chinese put up a wall, stupid Mongorians have to come and knock it down?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: South Park, now encircled by the Great Wall, later.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Marsh house, living room. Stan is on the sofa watching TV. His parents enter. Randy is carrying a box

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Stan, our abduction problems are over. We got the new Child Tracker.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Child Tracker?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: It's a little electrical device that can tell us where you are anywhere on Earth.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: If anybody takes you, we'll be able to locate your exact location within two meters.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Moments later, Randy finishes installing the Tracker, and both parents smile.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: There, I think that's got it.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: ...Dude, no way! I'm not wearing Child Tracker!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: You can barely even tell you have one on.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I'm not going to school like this! What will all the other guys say?!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I wouldn't worry about that.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: School bus stop, next day. Stan is wearing his tracker. Kyle, Cartman, and Tweek are wearing their own trackers. All trackers are activated.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: So weak. So weak, dude. Man.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Why did you go and have to be abducted, Tweek? Now all our parents are freaking out!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I didn't mean to.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Great Wall of South Park. Tuong finishes the repairs on the damaged section.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Okay. Finary.  Oh no.  It's those God-damned Mongorians again! Stop! Stop right there, Mongorians!  God-damnit, stop!  Stop breaking down my city wall you stupid Mongoriaaans!  Ay, you sons of bitches, you-  What the hell??  Oh, shit!  OH, GOD-DAMNED MONGORIANS!!  I'm gonna get you, fuckin' Mongorians! Don't break down my city wall!  Oh, God-damnit! That's the last time you're gonna break down my city wall! You hear me, Mongorians?! God-damned Mongorians.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: A baseball field. A cheer comes up from the bleachers. A close-up shows the townsfolk rooting for their Cows.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Alright, Cows, We're gonna go out there and we're gonna give 'em hell!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: But, wait. Where's the other team?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: There is no other team.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Huh?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Well, we've... put a wall around the city to keep outsiders out. You don't think we want a bunch of strangers coming in to play ball, do you?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: But if there is no other team, then it won't be any fun.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Don't worry, it'll still be fun for us.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Go Cows! Go Cows! Go Cows! Go Cows!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Play ball!  Steeeeee-riiike

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yeah! Woohoo! Yeah!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Crust E. Krotch's Pizza, Corral, night. The town is in there celebrating a victory. Ned is playing "Thirst For Blood"

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: South Park Cows do it again!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Congratulations on your victory, boys.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Dude, we weren't playing anybody.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yeah, and you kicked ass!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Isn't it awesome havin' a great wall around our city? Nobody in town except for our good friends.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yeahah! Alright! Yeah. Right on! Right on!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Guys! Sh, quiet everyone.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: And this newest study reveals more about child abductions than we apparently knew before, Tom.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Turn it up.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: That's right, Chris. This newest study shows that the majority of child abductions are NOT commited by strangers, but by somebody the child knows in their own town.  The report further states that it is because the child trusts the individual that problems occur in the first place.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Well, I guess this means the enemy is in our own backyard, so to speak.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Sure does, Tom.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Alright, thanks, Chris. Is the weather going to turn su-

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Well, if you'll all excuse us, I think we'll be going now.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yeah. Come along, Kyle

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Stanley, time for us to get back to the house.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I'm not done with my pizza.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: NOW, Stanley!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Great Wall of South Park. Tuong is working on something behind a brick shield.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Eh. Eh, eh, there we go.  All finished. My Mongolian Missile Defense system. Those Mongolians try to break down my city wall again, they gonna get a big heat-seeking missile surprise! Oh! Hello Mongolians. Yeah. You come to break down my city wall?  Oh, you gonna throw that baseball at my wall?? Oh no! Not a baseball! I'm pretty scared. Well, you know what? I might have something here that's a little bigger than a baseball. Say hello to my little friend!  Aw, crap.  Ooohhhh  God-damned Mongolians!! You break down my city wall foda last time!!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: South Park, the bus stop, next day. The parents are present with the boys as they wait for the school bus

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Dude, this is worse than Child Tracker.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: 'Sokay, boys. Just act as if we weren't here.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Right. Do what you normally would do.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: You're such a fatass, Cartman.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: At least I'm not a stupid Jew.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Whatwhatwhaaat??

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: South Park Elementary. The bell rings and the class begins. Mr. Mackey is at the board.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: M'kay, kids, so, now, who can tell me what year the first moon landing took place?  Uh, how about you, Clyde?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Nineteen six-

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: No helping!  M'kay, I'm not really sure havin' all the parents here is a good idea, m'kay?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Well, maybe things could be better if we could trust people like the Stotches!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Us?? Your family's all be the shifty-eyed ones!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh yeah?!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, this is too much to take.  Mom, Dad, could you please leave me alone?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: We just wanna make sure nobody hurts you, Junior, m'kay?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: M'kay.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Great Wall of South Park. Mr. Lu Kim wheels a vat of boiling fluid to one of the openings

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Hahahaha! My masterpiece!  When those Mongolians come next time, I pour this sweet and sour pork on their heads. Haha, sweet and sour pork so hot and sticky, Mongolians'll stick ahright up to the wall! And scream "UhwOoOoOoOoo!" Oh I can't wait.  Oh, I get it. A Trojan Mongolian horse. Mongolians a-hiding inside thinking that I'll bring it in city wall, then Mongolians pop out and destroy wall from the inside out without gettin' any sweet and sour pork on their heads! Okay. I'll pray around.  Oh! Oh rook! Rook, my very own Mongorian Trojan horse! Gee, what a surprise! I guess Mongorians aren't such crappy, smelly people after all!  Yeah. Great! Rwow!  Yeah, what a great present! I'm just gonna push it inside the gate and soon tell all my friends.  Oh, it's sweet and sour pork!  Oh! I'm going to get you Nogodians, if it's the last thing I do!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Tweek house, night. The parents are in the living room sitting together on the sofa watching TV and sharing a bag of popcorn. A blanket covers their legs. The surroundings show an iron door where the front door is, and roll-down iron blinds over the windows

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: And so all the residents of Manhattan are prepared to evacuate if Ms. Clinton's ass gets any bigger. And in other news, new findings on the increase in child abductions.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh Jesus, turn it up, honey!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The study shows that the most likely abductors of children... are the parents themselves!  The study reveals that nine out of every ten abduction cases are commited by the child's mother or father. The bottom line being that your children aren't safe, even from you!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Where are you going?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Uh. I'm just going to go upstairs and see if Tweek is still in his bed.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh??  I think I'll go with you.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: It's okay. I can do it.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I just want to make sure that you-

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: That I don't abduct him? How do I know that you haven't done it already??

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Me?? I would never abduct our son!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: That's not what the new study says!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Well what are we supposed to do, eh-? How can we protect Tweek from ourselves?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: South Park, next day. The familes gather on a neighborhood street. The parents are hugging their kids.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Here you go, Stanley. This should hold you over for three years.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: But why do I have to leave?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The news says that at your age you aren't safe with us, son. You have to get out of here before we abduct you.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Good-bye, son.  Remember to eat right.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Look out for your brother, Kyle. You're the man now.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, boys! Don't ever forget that we love you!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Be careful out there!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Where are we supposed to go?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: We can't tell you because we can't know where you are!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, this is terrible!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Go on, kids! Go! Go and don't look back!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Good-bye, kids. We'll... never forget you.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Dude, sometimes I think our parents are really stupid.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh my God.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Great Wall of South Park, day. Tuong is still congealed under the sweet and sour sauce the Mongolians dumped on him, but the Trojan Mongolian horse is gone. A dog walks by and sniffs

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Ah. Hey daw. O'er 'ere. O'er 'ere, dog. Got som'in sweet and souh foh ya.  Good dog! That's it! Keep licking, dog!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Some time later. Tuong runs along the ramparts of the wall, finally freed from the sweet and sour pork that had held him in place

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Hahahahahaaa! I'm free, Mongolians! And now I'm gonna make you PAY!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Marsh house, night. Randy is at the sofa watching the news.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Finally, some good news tonight. It's been several days since any child abductions have taken place. The main reason: parents don't know where their children are.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: What's the matter?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, it's just... I was wondering if Stan's okay.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, I'm sure he's made it somewhere safe by now.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Do you really think we did the right thing, Randy? Sending all the young kids in town to live on their own?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Sweetheart, you saw the news...

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I know.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Don't you worry. I'm sure that Stan and all the other kids are somewhere safe, off in a whole new city by now, making a new life for themselves.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: A Mongolian camp outside the Great Wall of South Park, night. The Mongolians are roasting and enjoying small animals, and drying the hides near a tent. The town's kids are now with them, wearing new clothes.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Tah tane da ke ab kahleh kalabush.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Bi ologad bag, big nan dastai.

text: De bandig baeakhalah?

text: Tawya mea pleda cleah bleah.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Triben fak burushban.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Shain balag!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The Great Wall of South Park, day. Tuong pops up outside the wall dressed in imperial attire.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Awright, Mongolians! Your only way through this wall is through me. This is my rast stand! I'm gonna do my war dance now.  Does my war dance ascare you, Mongolians? Yeah, you think you want a piece of this?  This is ancient Chinese dance of a- Oh, herro kids. Uh be careful, there's a-Mongolians up there.  Oh, crap!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: What's going on?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: I heard an explosion.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: God-damned Mongolians attacked city wall again!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Mongolians??

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: What the hell are they doin' here?! Rabble! Rabble rabble!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Rabble rabble rabble rabble!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Wait a minute. Those Mongolians are... our children.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Ike?? Kyle??

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: My son has become a Mongolian?? No! Noooo!!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh God. What have we done? We sent our children away, and now they don't even remember who they are.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Kids? Don't you remember us?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Wait wait. I learned some Mongolian in college.  Ah, let's see. Uh. K-kids, uh, Bi kute. Bi salnek kute. Uh-d tah tasobarro.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh my God, our parents are so stupid, dude.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Bi kute.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: We are your parents. You used to live here, with us.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yeah, it was like four days ago!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: They're starting to remember.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Staaan. Your name... is Staaan!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Uh huh, Stan Marsh.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: That's it! Remember, son! Rememmmber!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: We're sorry, Tweek!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Are you okay, Clyde?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, son, can you ever forgive us?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Huh, I'm over here, Dad.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: We're sorry, kids. We just let all those sensationalist news reports go to our heads.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh my God, do you see what this means? The Ghost of Human Kindness was right all along.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: You mean how he said we should trust each other, or how he abducted children?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: The uh... no no, the part about being more trusting. We should follow what he said, not what he did.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Wow, yeah. Oh yeah.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: No, no. You know who was right all along? The Mongolians.  They knew that you just can't wall yourself off from the outside world. Putting walls up never helps anything. Tearing them down brings us together.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Whoa! Wow. Right!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yeah, the Mongolians were right. Yeah.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Aw, you'd better not say what I think you're gonna say.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Mr. Lu Kim, tear down this wall!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Oh, God! I hate this whole shitty!

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Randy, can we just take our son home now?

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Yes, kids.  With us, now come. Home. Hoomme.

title: CHILD ABDUCTION IS NOT FUNNY
text: Jesus Christ, dude, they've done some stupid crap before, but Jesus Christ.
